languages.text: "Меня облили его кровью. Если бы мутации были заразны, я бы уже мутировал{mf||а}".
"I was drenched in his blood. If the mutations were contagious, I would have mutated by now."
languages.original_text: "Меня облили его кровью. Если бы мутации были заразны, я бы уже мутировал{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: "I was drenched in his blood. If the mutations were contagious, I would have mutated by now."
"I was drenched in his blood. If the mutations were contagious, I would have mutated by now."
"I was drenched in his blood. If the mutations were contagious, I would have mutated by now."
"I was drenched in his blood. If the mutations were contagious, I would have mutated by now."
"I was drenched in his blood. If the mutations were contagious, I would have mutated by now."
"I was drenched in his blood. If the mutations were contagious, I would have mutated by now."

languages.text: « Son sang a giclé partout sur moi. Si les mutations étaient contagieuses, j'en ressentirais déjà les effets. »
languages.original_text: "I was drenched in his blood. If the mutations were contagious, I would have mutated by now."

traits.locale_text: « Son sang a giclé partout sur moi. Si les mutations étaient contagieuses, j'en ressentirais déjà les effets. »

languages.text: «He estado empapado de su sangre. Si las mutaciones fueran contagiosas, ya estaría mutando».
languages.original_text: "I was drenched in his blood. If the mutations were contagious, I would have mutated by now."

traits.locale_text: «He estado empapado de su sangre. Si las mutaciones fueran contagiosas, ya estaría mutando».

languages.text: “我当时浑身上下都是他的鲜血。如果他身上的突变会传染的话，我现在早就变异了。”
languages.original_text: "I was drenched in his blood. If the mutations were contagious, I would have mutated by now."

traits.locale_text: “我当时浑身上下都是他的鲜血。如果他身上的突变会传染的话，我现在早就变异了。”

languages.text: 「私は彼の血を浴びた。もし突然変異が伝染するのなら、私は今頃変異していただろう」
languages.original_text: "I was drenched in his blood. If the mutations were contagious, I would have mutated by now."

traits.locale_text: 「私は彼の血を浴びた。もし突然変異が伝染するのなら、私は今頃変異していただろう」

languages.text: "Ich war überzogen von seinem Blut. Wären die Mutationen ansteckend, wäre ich längst mutiert."
languages.original_text: "I was drenched in his blood. If the mutations were contagious, I would have mutated by now."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war überzogen von seinem Blut. Wären die Mutationen ansteckend, wäre ich längst mutiert."

languages.text: "Onun kanına bulandım. Eğer ki mutasyon bulaşıcı olsaydı şimdiye mutasyon geçirmiştim."
languages.original_text: "I was drenched in his blood. If the mutations were contagious, I would have mutated by now."
